name: part_012
file: tmp_hololive production COUNTDOWN LIVE 2022▷2023 -hololive side-【#ホロライブカウントダウン】 [n-fzN8-i3Qc]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_012.mov

scenes.description: Transition into the shuffle medley, featuring Shirogane Noel in her knight outfit.
Shirogane Noel performs 'Egao no Sunburst' (originally by Oozora Subaru) on a fruit-themed stage.
Oozora Subaru performs 'Vibes' (originally by Shirogane Noel) while wearing Noel's knight outfit.
Omaru Polka performs 'Smile & Go!!' (originally by Shishiro Botan) on a sweets-themed stage.
Shishiro Botan performs 'Wa-o!!' (originally by Omaru Polka) while wearing a lab coat on a clock-themed stage.
Moona Hoshinova performs 'Pekoranda' (originally by Usada Pekora) while wearing Pekora's outfit.
Akai Haato performs 'Ahoy!!' (originally by Houshou Marine) while wearing Marine's outfit and transitioning into a swimsuit.
Murasaki Shion performs 'Stray Stray' (originally by La+ Darknesss) while wearing Laplus's outfit in a dark room.

subtitles.original: 笑顔のサンライト
subtitles.english: Sunlight of smiles

subtitles.original: どんな暗闇の中でも 強いきらめき
subtitles.english: A strong sparkle even in any darkness

subtitles.original: 君に届いているかな 一ミリでも
subtitles.english: Is it reaching you? Even just a millimeter...

subtitles.original: 伝わればいい
subtitles.english: ...if it gets through, that's enough

subtitles.original: チャージ チャレンジ 全力アクセル がんばる君へ
subtitles.english: Charge, challenge, full throttle, to you doing your best

subtitles.original: 一番ノリノリのスマイルを送る 昴チャンネル

subtitles.original: Every day, My day
subtitles.english: Every day, My day

subtitles.english: Everyone together!

subtitles.english: Feel more expectation

subtitles.english: Treasure feeling, refreshing!

subtitles.original: 異論ハロは認めません

subtitles.english: U & I, here is the lady

subtitles.english: Keep watching, Lyrica on the beat

subtitles.english: No matter how high the wall

subtitles.english: Let's all go to a world no one has ever seen

subtitles.original: 君と Smile and Go 信じたもん勝ち

subtitles.original: 君と Smile and Go はじけたもん勝ち
subtitles.english: With you, Smile and Go, the one who bursts out wins

subtitles.original: ここに笑顔で集まれば 最高でしょ！
subtitles.english: If we gather here with smiles, it's the best, right?

subtitles.original: 僕ら Smile and Go 持ってんでしょ？
subtitles.english: We're Smile and Go, we have it, right?

subtitles.original: 僕ら Smile and Go 遊びまくろうぜ！
subtitles.english: We're Smile and Go, let's play around!

subtitles.original: この日常が大切な宝物
subtitles.english: This daily life is a precious treasure

subtitles.original: Smile and Go! Smile and Go!
subtitles.english: Smile and Go! Smile and Go!

subtitles.original: なりたい僕を 君が好きな僕を

subtitles.original: ちゃんと余りなく見せたいの
subtitles.english: I want to show it all without leaving anything out
